  Item 9.01.  Financial Statements and Exhibits  
                                                 
Exhibits are filed herewith in connection with the 
Registration Statement on Form S-3(File No.        
333-269514)filed by Wells Fargo & Company (the     
“Company”) with the Securities and Exchange        
Commission (the “SEC”). On October 23, 2023, the   
Company issued the following Medium-Term Notes,    
Series W: (i) $2,750,000,000 Senior Redeemable     
Fixed-to-FloatingRate Notes due October 23, 2029;  
and (ii) $3,250,000,000 Senior Redeemable Fixed-to-
FloatingRate Notes due October 23, 2034            
(collectively, the “Notes”). The purpose of this   
Current Report is to file with the SEC the         
following documents: (i) the form of Note related  
to each issuance; and (ii) the opinion of Faegre   
Drinker Biddle & Reath LLP regarding the Notes.    
                 
  (d)  Exhibits
